verses.t: I{G1473} charge{G1263} thee therefore{G3767} before{G1799} God{G3588}, and{G2532} the Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}, who shall{G3195} judge{G2919} the quick{G2198} and{G2532} the dead{G3498} at{G2596} his{G846} appearing{G3588} and{G2532} his{G846} kingdom{G3588};

Preach{G2784} the word{G3588}; be instant{G2186} in season{G2122}, out of season{G171}; reprove{G1651}, rebuke{G2008}, exhort{G3870} with{G1722} all{G3956} longsuffering{G3115} and{G2532} doctrine{G1322}.

For{G1063} the time{G2540} will come{G2071} when{G3753} they will{G430} not{G3756} endure{G430} sound{G5198} doctrine{G1319}; but{G235} after{G2596}their own{G2398} lusts{G3588} shall they heap{G2002} to themselves{G1438} teachers{G1320}, having itching{G2833} ears{G3588};
And{G2532} they shall turn away{G654} their ears{G3588} from{G575} the truth{G3588}, and{G1161} shall be turned{G1624} unto{G1909} fables{G3588}.
But{G1161} watch{G3525} thou{G4771} in{G1722} all things{G3956}, endure afflictions{G2553}, do{G4160} the work{G2041} of an evangelist{G2099}, make full proof{G4135} of thy{G4675} ministry{G3588}.
For{G1063} I{G1473} am{G4689} now{G2235} ready to be offered{G4689}, and{G2532} the time{G3588} of my{G1699} departure{G359} is at hand{G2186}.
I have fought{G75} a good{G2570} fight{G3588}, I have finished{G5055} my course{G3588}, I have kept{G5083} the faith{G3588}:

Henceforth{G3063} there is laid up{G606} for me{G3427} a crown{G4735} of righteousness{G3588}, which{G3739} the Lord{G3588}, the righteous{G1342} judge{G2923}, shall give{G591} me{G3427} at{G1722} that{G1565} day{G3588}: and{G1161} not{G3756} to me{G1698} only{G3440}, but{G235} unto all{G3956} them{G25} also{G2532} that love{G25} his{G846} appearing{G3588}.
Do thy diligence{G4704} to come{G2064} shortly{G5030} unto{G4314} me{G3165}:

For{G1063} Demas{G1214} hath forsaken{G1459} me{G3165}, having loved{G25} this{G3588} present{G3568} world{G165}, and{G2532} is departed{G4198} unto{G1519} Thessalonica{G2332}; Crescens{G2913} to{G1519} Galatia{G1053}, Titus{G5103} unto{G1519} Dalmatia{G1149}.

Only{G3441} Luke{G3065} is{G2076} with{G3326} me{G1700}. Take{G353} Mark{G3138}, and{G353} bring{G71} him with{G3326} thee{G4572}: for{G1063} he is{G2076} profitable{G2173} to me{G3427} for{G1519} the ministry{G1248}.
And{G1161} Tychicus{G5190} have I sent{G649} to{G1519} Ephesus{G2181}.

The cloke{G5341} that{G3739} I left{G620} at{G1722} Troas{G5174} with{G3844} Carpus{G2591}, when thou comest{G2064}, bring{G5342} with thee, and{G2532} the books{G3588}, but especially{G3122} the parchments{G3588}.
Alexander{G223} the coppersmith{G3588} did{G1731} me{G3427} much{G4183} evil{G2556}: the Lord{G3588} reward{G591} him{G846} according to{G2596} his{G846} works{G3588}:
Of{G5442} whom{G3739} be thou{G4771} ware{G5442} also{G2532}; for{G1063} he hath{G436} greatly{G3029} withstood{G436} our{G2251} words{G3056}.

At{G1722} my{G3450} first{G4413} answer{G627} no man{G3762} stood with{G4836} me{G3427}, but{G235} all{G3956} men forsook{G1459} me{G3165}: I pray God that it may{G3049} not{G3361} be laid{G3049} to their charge{G846}.

Notwithstanding{G1161} the Lord{G2962} stood{G3936} with me{G3427}, and{G2532} strengthened{G1743} me{G3165}; that{G2443} by{G1223} me{G1700} the preaching{G3588} might be fully known{G4135}, and{G2532} that all{G3956} the Gentiles{G3588} might hear{G191}: and{G2532} I was delivered{G4506} out of{G1537} the mouth{G4750} of the lion{G3023}.

And{G2532} the Lord{G3588} shall deliver{G4506} me{G3165} from{G575} every{G3956} evil{G4190} work{G2041}, and{G2532} will preserve{G4982} me unto{G1519} his{G846} heavenly{G2032} kingdom{G3588}: to whom{G3739} be glory{G3588} for{G1519} ever{G3588} and ever{G3588}. Amen{G281}.
Salute{G782} Prisca{G4251} and{G2532} Aquila{G207}, and{G2532} the household{G3624} of Onesiphorus{G3683}.
Erastus{G2037} abode{G3306} at{G1722} Corinth{G2882}: but{G1161} Trophimus{G5161} have I left{G620} at{G1722} Miletum{G3399} sick{G770}.

Do thy diligence{G4704} to come{G2064} before{G4253} winter{G5494}. Eubulus{G2103} greeteth{G782} thee{G4571}, and{G2532} Pudens{G4227}, and{G2532} Linus{G3044}, and{G2532} Claudia{G2803}, and{G2532} all{G3956} the brethren{G3588}.
The Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547} be with{G3326} thy{G4675} spirit{G3588}. Grace{G3588} be with{G3326} you{G5216}. Amen{G281}.
